name: Sasori Fukurowashi
movement: fly 80 ft., walk 40 ft., climb 20 ft.
description: The Sasori Fukurowashi is a Medium-sized fey creature characterized by its exceptional agility and notable physical attributes. With high Dexterity and Wisdom scores, it is difficult to detect and has a keen awareness of its surroundings.
memorable: Its ability to shift between planes and resist various elemental damages makes it a formidable foe in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to explore and protect its surroundings, using its agility to evade danger.
relations: May be found in the company of other fey creatures or serving as guardians of natural places.
environment: Often encountered in magical forests or mystical realms.
strengths: Possesses truesight up to 60 feet and can avoid opportunity attacks when flying, giving it tactical mobility.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks, despite its many resistances and immunities.
attacks: Engages with multiple attacks using claws, sting, and talons, grappling targets and dealing a mix of bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damages.
most_powerful_ability: Ethereal Jaunt enables it to navigate between the Material and Ethereal Planes swiftly, enhancing its evasion tactics.
senses: Has truesight out to 60 feet, allowing it to detect invisible creatures and objects.
skills: Highly skilled in perception and stealth, making it adept at avoiding detection.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and exhaustion enhances its resilience.
High passive perception and saving throws for Dexterity and Wisdom.
Magic Resistance provides an advantage against spells.
Equipped with Keen Hearing and Sight for improved senses.
test_queries: agile fey that can fly and grapple
creature with magical resistance and truesight
stealthy fey with the ability to shift planes
resilient fey resistant to elemental damage
medium-sized fey known for its versatile attacks
